modules.description: Converts between Traditional and Simplified Chinese using character and phrase mappings, handles regional variants, and supports idiomatic expressions specific to Mainland China, Taiwan, and Hong Kong. Operates on strings and text sequences with predefined conversion tables. Used to standardize text input for multilingual applications or to process historical documents with regional language variations.

Provides functions to create a converter instance from a configuration file, convert UTF-8 encoded strings between Traditional and Simplified Chinese, and retrieve error messages. Works with configuration paths, UTF-8 strings, and internal converter state. Used to process text for regional Chinese language variations, such as converting between Mainland and Taiwanese formats.
